item.title: Solve Spring Boot Unknown Error
item.description: I was working on a short Spring Boot project. However, on my computer, no matter what I tried, it couldn’t start and gave me “unknown error”. The following is the error log: Wrong Spring Boot output: 4:01:54 PM: Executing external task 'bootRun'... :compileJava UP-TO-DATE :processResources UP-TO-DATE :classes UP-TO-DATE :findMainClass :bootRun . ____ _ __ _ _ /\\ / ___'_ __ _ _(_)_ __ __ _ \ \ \ \ ( ( )\___ | '_ | '_| | '_ \/ _` | \ \ \ \ \\/ ___)| |_)| | | | | || (_| | ) ) ) ) ' |____| .
